title: Dazzle, Volume 01
description: "A young girl named Rahzel is abruptly sent off to see the world by her father. She is alone on her travels -- until she meets Alzeid, a mysterious loner on a mission of revenge. At first the two don't get along... but little by little, Alzeid opens his heart to Rahzel. It's a good thing, too -- because with the dangerous (and at times romantic) road ahead, they will need to rely on each other to survive!"--Cover.Rahzel, sent to see the world by her father, meets Alzeid, a loner with the same magical powers as she, who is on a mission of revenge for his father's death, and they journey together to right the wrongs of the world--for the right price.
author: Minari Endoh
